title: Awesome List Updates on Oct 20, 2021

items.title: Awesome Hacking
items.content_text:
### Tools / Other

*   [Decompiler.com](https://www.decompiler.com/) - Java, Android, Python, C# online decompiler.
items.content_html:
Tools / Other

  • Decompiler.com - Java, Android, Python, C# online decompiler.

items.title: Awesome Pentest
items.content_text:
### Privilege Escalation Tools / Web application and resource analysis tools

*   [GTFOBins](https://gtfobins.github.io/) - Curated list of Unix binaries that can be used to bypass local security restrictions in misconfigured systems.
items.content_html:
Privilege Escalation Tools / Web application and resource analysis tools

  • GTFOBins - Curated list of Unix binaries that can be used to bypass local security restrictions in misconfigured systems.

items.title: Awesome Remote Job
items.content_text:

items.content_html:
Articles & Posts

  • This Is the Future Of Remote Work In 2021

items.title: Awesome Swift
items.content_text:
### Augmented Reality

*   [ARHeadsetKit (â­126)](https://github.com/philipturner/ARHeadsetKit) - High-level framework for using $5 Google Cardboard to replicate Microsoft Hololens.
items.content_html:
Augmented Reality

  • ARHeadsetKit (â­126) - High-level framework for using $5 Google Cardboard to replicate Microsoft Hololens.

items.title: Awesome Ios
items.content_text:
### ScrollView

*   [SpreadsheetView (â­3.5k)](https://github.com/bannzai/SpreadsheetView) - Full configurable spreadsheet view user interfaces for iOS applications. With this framework, you can easily create complex layouts like schedule, Gantt chart or timetable as if you are using Excel.
items.content_html:
ScrollView

  • SpreadsheetView (â­3.5k) - Full configurable spreadsheet view user interfaces for iOS applications. With this framework, you can easily create complex layouts like schedule, Gantt chart or timetable as if you are using Excel.

items.title: Awesome Directus
items.content_text:
### Resources / Official

*   [Live Discussions on Discord](https://directus.chat)

### Extensions / Community

*   [Draw Interface (â­11)](https://github.com/jesusgp22/directus-draw-interface) - Free draw interface for Directus app.
items.content_html:
Resources / Official

  • Live Discussions on Discord

Extensions / Community

  • Draw Interface (â­11) - Free draw interface for Directus app.

items.title: Public Apis
items.content_text:
### Animals

- API: [Dog Facts](https://kinduff.github.io/dog-api/)

  Description: Random facts of Dogs

  Auth: No

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Yes



### Anti-Malware

- API: [Phisherman](https://phisherman.gg/)

  Description: IP/domain/URL reputation

  Auth: `apiKey`

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Unknown



### Personality

- API: [Zen Quotes](https://zenquotes.io/)

  Description: Large collection of Zen quotes for inspiration

  Auth: No

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Yes



### Transportation

- API: [Impala Hotel Bookings](https://docs.impala.travel/docs/booking-api/)

  Description: Hotel content, rates and room bookings

  Auth: `apiKey`

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: No



### URL Shorteners

- API: [Mgnet.me](http://mgnet.me/api.html)

  Description: Torrent URL shorten API

  Auth: No

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: No
